CustomField.description: Indicates that CS team has been alerted about this opportunity reaching Stage 4 or 5. Set automatically by Flow when deal enters Proposal or Negotiation stage. Only triggers once per opportunity.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Auto-set when deal reaches Stage 4 (Proposal) or Stage 5 (Negotiation). Triggers CS staffing notification.
CustomField.label: CS Staffing Alert Sent
